      • resolveStateRefBinaryComponent

        @CordaInternal
 @Nullable
public SerializedBytes<net.corda.core.contracts.TransactionState> resolveStateRefBinaryComponent(@NotNull
                                                                                                                           StateRef stateRef,
                                                                                                                           @NotNull
                                                                                                                           ServicesForResolution services)

        This is the main logic that knows how to retrieve the binary representation of class StateRefs.

        For class ContractUpgradeWireTransaction or class NotaryChangeWireTransaction it knows how to recreate the output state in the correct classloader independent of the node's classpath.

        See Also:
        class StateRef, class ContractUpgradeWireTransaction, class NotaryChangeWireTransaction
